con:request.name: SaveOrUpdateActiveSpeedAlertMethod
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spe="http://ns.hughestelematics.com/v1.0/service/SpeedAlertMethodServiceV5_0" xmlns:v1="http://xmlns.hughestelematics.com/Gateway/SpeedAlert/V1" xmlns:v11="http://xmlns.hughestelematics.com/Gateway/Common/Header/V1" xmlns:v12="http://xmlns.hughestelematics.com/Gateway/Common/Schedule/V1"> <soapenv:Header> <api_key>${#Project#api_key}</api_key> ${#Project#SessionToken} </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <spe:SaveOrUpdateActiveSpeedAlertMethod> <!--Optional:--> <SpeedAlertRequest> <v1:context> <v11:SourceName>WEB</v11:SourceName> <v11:TransactionId>test54954656456</v11:TransactionId> <v11:Timestamp>2015-04-10T07:45:02.001Z</v11:Timestamp> <v11:Organization>${#Project#Organization}</v11:Organization> <v11:Region>US</v11:Region> <v11:ApplicationName>CWP</v11:ApplicationName> </v1:context> <v1:Data> <v1:SpeedAlertConfig> <v1:speedAlert> <!--Optional:--> <v1:alertPreference> <!--Optional:--> <v1:alertByEmail>true</v1:alertByEmail> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <v1:emails> <!--Optional:--> <v1:emailOrSmsTn>haritha.kulakarni@verizon.com</v1:emailOrSmsTn> <!--Optional:--> <v1:enable>true</v1:enable> <!--Optional:--> <v1:aliasName></v1:aliasName> </v1:emails> <!--Optional:--> <v1:alertBySms>false</v1:alertBySms> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <v1:smsTns> <!--Optional:--> <v1:emailOrSmsTn>4044313327</v1:emailOrSmsTn> <!--Optional:--> <v1:enable>true</v1:enable> <!--Optional:--> <v1:aliasName></v1:aliasName> </v1:smsTns> </v1:alertPreference> <v1:maximumSpeed>60</v1:maximumSpeed> <!--Optional:--> <v1:name>VW Speed Alert from CWP12</v1:name> <!--Optional:--> <v1:enabled>true</v1:enabled> <!--Optional:--> <v1:deleted>false</v1:deleted> <!--Optional:--> <v1:requestType>ACTIVATE</v1:requestType> <!--Optional:--> <v1:statusIndicator>active</v1:statusIndicator> <!--Optional:--> <v1:speedId>11</v1:speedId> <!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:--> <v1:schedule> <v12:ScheduleType>daily</v12:ScheduleType> <!--Optional:--> <v12:DailySchedule> <!--Optional:--> <v12:DayInterval>1</v12:DayInterval> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <v12:DaySchedule> <v12:DayOfWeek>1</v12:DayOfWeek> <v12:MinutesFromMidnight>540</v12:MinutesFromMidnight> <v12:Duration>120</v12:Duration> </v12:DaySchedule> </v12:DailySchedule> <!--Optional:--> <v12:WeeklySchedule> <!--Optional:--> <v12:WeekInterval/> <v12:WeekSchedule> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <v12:DaySchedule> <v12:DayOfWeek/> <v12:MinutesFromMidnight/> <v12:Duration/> </v12:DaySchedule> </v12:WeekSchedule> </v12:WeeklySchedule> <!--Optional:--> <v12:MonthlySchedule> <v12:DayOfMonth/> <!--Optional:--> <v12:monthInterval/> <!--Optional:--> <v12:MinutesFromMidnight/> </v12:MonthlySchedule> <!--Optional:--> <v12:SingleSchedule> <!--Optional:--> <v12:DayInterval/> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <v12:DaySchedule> <v12:DayOfWeek/> <v12:MinutesFromMidnight/> <v12:Duration/> </v12:DaySchedule> </v12:SingleSchedule> </v1:schedule> <!--Optional:--> <v1:popupFlag>false</v1:popupFlag> </v1:speedAlert> </v1:SpeedAlertConfig> <v1:AccountId>${#Project#AccountId}</v1:AccountId> <v1:VIN>${#Project#VIN}</v1:VIN> <v1:TCUID>${#Project#TCUID}</v1:TCUID> <!--Optional:--> <v1:UserId>${#Project#AccountId}</v1:UserId> </v1:Data> </SpeedAlertRequest> </spe:SaveOrUpdateActiveSpeedAlertMethod> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
